name: Cristina David
content: Responsive HTML5 Website Template for Developers | 3rd Wave Media Research Interests Programming languages Code generation (both rule-based and LLM-based) Program verification (especially of programs handling dynamically allocated data structures) Design of decision procedures Ongoing projects C to Rust translation: Ownership Guided C to Rust Translation (CAV'23) [pdf] Towards Translating Real-World Code with LLMs: A Study of Translating to Rust [preprint] Scalable, Validated Code Translation of Entire Projects using Large Language Models (accepted at PLDI'25) [preprint] Using neurosymbolic reasoning to enhance LLM's long-term planning: Enhancing SQL Query Generation with Neurosymbolic Reasoning (accepted at AAAI'25) [preprint] Integrating Large Language Models and Reinforcement Learning for Non-Linear Reasoning (accepted at FSE'25) [preprint] Java refactoring: Quantifying the benefits of code hints for refactoring deprecated Java APIs (accepted at FSE'25 - Industry Track) [preprint] Interactive exploration of visual outputs enabled by program analysis: Cognacy Queries over Dependence Graphs for Transparent Visualisations (accepted at ESOP'25) [preprint] LLM uncertainty estiamtion for code generation: Assessing Correctness in LLM-Based Code Generation via Uncertainty Estimation [preprint] I am looking for motivated PhD students and postdoctoral researchers. Please get in touch if you are interested. PhD students and PostDocs Arindam Sharma (Research Associate) Roly Perera (Research Fellow) Henrijs Princis (PhD student, 2025 --) Joseph Bond (PhD student, 2020 --) Yoav Alon (PhD student, 2020 --) Hanliang Zhang (PhD student, 2022 --) (second supervisor) Pascal Kesseli (graduated in 2017) co-supervised with Daniel Kroening at University of Oxford News [Oct 2022] I'll be on the program committee of ICSE 2024 and CAV 2023. Also, I'll be PC co-chair of TASE 2023. [Sept 2022] Invited talk at King's College on our FSE'22 paper Using Graph Neural Networks for Program Termination. [May 2022] My Royal Society URF has been extended until 06/2026. I'll be on the program committee of ICSE 2023, PEPM 2023 and SAC-SVT 2023.
